decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, dated 06/13, received 09/07/13; TT-011 P01 Rev: C, dated 09/08, received 09/07/13; TT-011 P02 Rev: C, dated 09/08, received 09/07/13; TT-011 EX01, dated 09/08, received 09/07/13; TT-011 EX02, dated 09/08, received 09/07/13; and Location Plan, undated, received 10/07/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a ground floor rear extension and rear roof extension
